description: Angular service class 'RecipeService' providing methods to fetch, filter, and manage recipe data, supporting both mock data and API data sources.

classes.name: RecipeService
classes.description: Service class for managing recipe data, including fetching, filtering, and caching recipes.

methods.name: getRecipes
methods.description: Fetches all recipes from API or mock data, applying current search filters.

methods.name: getRecipeById
methods.description: Retrieves a specific recipe by ID from API or mock data.

methods.name: updateSearchFilters
methods.description: Updates the current search filters and triggers recipe filtering.

methods.name: getSearchFilters
methods.description: Returns an observable of the current search filters.

methods.name: filterRecipes
methods.description: Filters a list of recipes based on provided search filters.

methods.name: getMockRecipes
methods.description: Provides a static list of mock recipes for testing or fallback.
